channel.title: Error runnig client (please help)
channel.description:
hello,
yesterday I downloaded a server (PI) on my PC. now i have downloaded the server on my laptop too, but when I run the client it gives an error. it says: [i]error occurred during initialization of VM could not reserve enough space for object heap.[/i] wat should I do so i can run te client?
with thanks in advance

item.title: Error runnig client (please help)
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

[quote=“Luuck, post:6, topic:502278”]yes it worked
thank you guys[/quote]
Have fun with extra mem usage.

Read full topic

item.title: Error runnig client (please help)
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

[quote=“Fire capez, post:4, topic:502278”][quote author=Luuck link=topic=620506.msg4248853#msg4248853 date=1362235403]
@echo off
“C:/Program Files/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe” -cp bin -Xms1024m -Xmx1024m Client 10 0 highmem members 32
pause
[/quote]

dunno why you’re allocating 1024mb of memory for the vm just to run the client

@echo off "C:/Program Files/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -cp bin Client 10 0 highmem members 32 pause[/quote]

Read full topic
